topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f9165b63687260af820200#post_54f9165b63687260af820200
I like to see everything as interesting.

This started when I was a kid who was bored. When I'm bored, I would act whatever is in my head. My parents told me that was embarrassing so instead, they told me to look at the things around me.

I did. And now, everything I see can be made into a story.
